paper_abstract: In the study, combining the concept of quality of classification (QoC) in Variable Precision Rough Set (VPRS) Theory and judgment matrix in Analytical Hierarchy Process (AHP), we design a method to process the data in decision tables, and obtain the significance of risk factors. Then, we explore the stable interval of variable precision factor beta on the significance.
paper_title: Using VPRS to mine the significance of risk factors in IT project management
